settings.title: Our Guarantee
Dermatologically Tested and Cruelty Free Skincare

settings.text_bar: Xtend-Life is a specialty, research-based family-owned manufacturer in New Zealand developing unique supplements & skincare

settings.maincontent: Xtend-Life Natural Products takes pride in our customer service and the ease with which our customers around the world can contact a 'real' person, and get answers to questions. You can contact us by filling in and submitting the form below or through our LiveChat service, by telephone, email, or post.

settings.title: Bundle Discounts
settings.answer:
Save up to 20% bundle discounts are calculated based on inclusive standard discounts listed below unless pricing is discounted during any other promotional period.

  • Save 5% off the retail bundle price (base bundle discount).
  • Save 15% off the retail bundle price.
  • Save 20% off the retail bundle price

settings.title: Refer a Friend
settings.answer: Provide the answer to the question here.

settings.title: Subscribe and Save
settings.answer:
Discount Offer for Existing Loyalty Program Members

  • The 10% discount code SUBSCRIBE10 is valid only at the time of joining ‘Subscribe and Save’. Thereafter, the Subscribe and Save discount is 15% on further order.
  • You must enter the discount code at ‘Check Out’ in to the ‘Discount Code or gift card box’.
  • The 10% discount code SUBSCRIBE10 is a onetime use only.
  • The 10% discount code SUBSCRIBE10 expires on the 25th April 2024 NZDT
  • The 10% discount code SUBSCRIBE10 cannot be deducted retrospectively once the order has been completed and charged.

settings.title: How do I create a subscription
settings.answer: Please watch our video walkthrough on this page.

settings.title: How do I reschedule my next order?
settings.answer:
• Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on 'Reschedule'
  • Choose how you wish to reschedule by selecting the most suitable option for your needs and Save Changes.

settings.title: How do I skip my next order?
settings.answer:
• Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on the Skip tab
  • You will be given the option to either gift your order to someone else or you can select 'Yes, Skip this order'.

settings.title: Can I skip some of the products in my schedule but have the remaining sent?
settings.answer:
Yes, you can skip a product(s) in future orders.

  • Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on 'View Your Next Order' or 'View Upcoming Orders'
  • Click the arrow for the product that you want to edit
  • You will have the choice now to Reschedule/Skip this product.

settings.title: How do I cancel my Subscription?
settings.answer:
• Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on 'Manage subscriptions'
  • Click on 'Manage this Subscription' (which can be found under the product name)
  • Scroll down and click on 'Cancel Subscription'/Click on Cancel Subscription

settings.title: How do I change my credit card?
settings.answer:
• Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on 'Address & Payment details'
  • Click on 'Manage Payment Methods'
  • Click on 'Edit'
  • Click on 'Send Edit Payment Link'
  • You will be sent an email to your Inbox. If you do not see this within a few minutes, please check your Spam/Junk Folder

settings.title: How do I create two or more subscriptions?
settings.answer: Please watch our video walkthrough on this page.

settings.title: What is the longest frequency I can have between orders?
settings.answer: Six months.

settings.title: Can I choose to have my order shipped on a particular date every month?
settings.answer: No, you can’t set your subscription to ship on a certain date each month, but you can log in and reschedule your next order to ship on a specified date if you wish.  If that date falls on a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday it will ship the next business day. Please refer to our FAQ ‘How do I reschedule my order’

settings.title: If I change any part of my subscription, what’s the latest time I can do this successfully prior to it shipping?
settings.answer: We advise making changes no later than 10:00pm Eastern Standard Time (EST) the day before the scheduled date of the order.

settings.title: What time of day is my payment processed?
settings.answer: Payment processing starts at 12:00am Eastern Standard Time (EST) the day of the scheduled date of the order.

settings.title: Can I have more than one address in my country of residence I can use?
settings.answer:
Yes, you can.

  • Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click on 'Address & Payment Details'
  • Click on 'Manage addresses'
  • Click on 'Add a New Address'

settings.title: Can I have different addresses for different subscriptions? Can I have two different payment methods if I have more than one subscription?
settings.answer: Yes, you can. Simply set up two different subscriptions. See FAQ 'How do I create a subscription'.

settings.title: Can I have two different payment methods if I have more than one subscription?
settings.answer: Yes, you can. Simply set up two different subscriptions. See FAQ 'How do I create a subscription'.

settings.title: Can I use a coupon code within my subscription?
settings.answer:
Yes, you can.

  • Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click 'View upcoming orders'
  • Click 'Add discount'
  • Enter the discount code and click 'Apply'

settings.title: What payment methods are available for subscriptions?
settings.answer: Mastercard, VISA, AMEX, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay and Shop Pay.

settings.title: Can I choose two different shipping methods if I have more than one subscription?
settings.answer: Please contact our Customer Relations Team here.

settings.title: How do I change shipping methods?
settings.answer: Please contact our Customer Relations Team here.

settings.title: I don’t know how to rejoin; can you help me? Can you do it for me?
settings.answer:
Yes, we can reactivate your subscription. Please contact our Customer Relations Team here.

You can also reactivate a cancelled subscription from your Subscribe & Save portal.

  • Log in to your account
  • Under the Subscribe and Save menu, click 'Manage Orders'
  • Click 'Manage Subscriptions'
  • Click the 'Inactive' tab
  • Click 'Reactivate'

settings.title: Can I see my order history once I rejoin Subscribe and Save?
settings.answer: Yes, if you have had a previous Loyalty Program account you will see all your past orders by logging in to your account.

settings.title: I don’t want an automated subscription, can I rejoin using Flexi-ship?
settings.answer: Flexi-ship has now been discontinued. However, with our Subscribe & Save program, you can reschedule and skip orders as you wish.

settings.title: Can I use the same login details that I currently have?
settings.answer: Yes, you can.

settings.title: Who can become an Xtendlife affiliate?
settings.answer: Anyone can become an Xtendlife affiliate. Our affiliates come from all over the world. You are most likely to be successful if you have prior online marketing skills and experience.

settings.title: How do I generate commissions?
settings.answer:
By referring people to our website who make a purchase, either using your unique affiliate link or your unique discount code during checkout.

If you refer someone who is already assosiated with another affiliate no commission will be generated.

settings.title: Someone I referred did not use my affiliate link when purchasing from Xtendlife. Can you add the customer to my affiliate account retroactively?
settings.answer: No, unfortunately, this isn’t possible. The new customer must use your unique affiliate link or discount code when registering in order to be linked with your affiliate account.

settings.title: How will I receive my payments?
settings.answer:
All commission payments are made via PayPal. Simply enter your PayPal email in the settings section of your Affiliate Admin.

If you don't have an existing PayPal account, sign up for a personal PayPal account here https://www.paypal.com/kn/webapps/mpp/account-selection.

settings.title: What conditions do I have to meet to get my commission payout?
settings.answer: Waiting on feedback from Kate per final agreement.
